text: Colin Esther (born November 1, 1989) is a Seychellois footballer. He is a midfielder playing for Seychellois club La Passe and the Seychelles national football team and has represented Seychelles in the AFCON 2018. ==National team statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" ! colspan=3 | Seychelles national team |- !Year!!Apps!!Goals |- |- |2008||1||0 |- |2009||1||0 |- |2010||0||0 |- |2011||0||0 |- |2012||0||0 |- |2013||3||1 |- |2014||4||0 |- |2015||4||0 |- |2016||3||0 |- |2017||5||0 |- |2018||5||0 |- !Total||27||1 |} ===International goals=== :Scores and results list Seychelles's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:100%;" !
